TextView.android:text: Kitchen essentials: the basics cover everything you need to simmer, boil, braise, sear, fry, mix, measure, pour, whisk, chop, cut, stir or strain. If you already own most of these, check out this list guide for a home cook for even more stuff to fill your kitchen with. To have a standard range of kitchen equipent, your drawers should contain at least an assortment of knives: vegetable, chopping,, chef's, utility knife etc. One should also posses a frying pan, somwhere where you can fry chips, rice and so on. Soup pots are always useful, especially when making a chicken soup for those cold winter days. A wide range of plates should also be present, together with mixing bowls, soup bowls. Cutting boards are the bacbkone of any kitchen, so they are extremely important. A wooden spoon is always useful, no matter the case. Silicone spatules are great for non-stick applications.
